title: PT-like JIT executor for C2 nets
body_html:
Summary:
Adding a PT-like executor for C2 net based on JIT:

  • C2 nets are converted into a JIT code, consisting of C2_OP, FORK, JOIN and
    RETURN instructions
  • dynamic execution, i.e. graph of tasks is fully dynamic and not known in
    advance

Differential Revision: D10500054
body_text:
Summary:
Adding a PT-like executor for C2 net based on JIT:

C2 nets are converted into a JIT code, consisting of C2_OP, FORK, JOIN and
RETURN instructions
dynamic execution, i.e. graph of tasks is fully dynamic and not known in
advance

Differential Revision: D10500054
body:
Summary:
Adding a PT-like executor for C2 net based on JIT:
 - C2 nets are converted into a JIT code, consisting of C2_OP, FORK, JOIN and
   RETURN instructions
 - dynamic execution, i.e. graph of tasks is fully dynamic and not known in
   advance

Differential Revision: D10500054
